item.title: No disabled access to pavement, 9th August
item.description:
No space for wheelchair or disabled motor vehicle. Make householders put bins on tjeir own property- there is space. All along this section of Lordship it is the same. Take action please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 248, Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Oldhill Dumping Ground, 9th August
item.description:
Oldhill and the surrounding streets have essentially become a communal tip- in addition to the usual litter carpeting the streets this morning, someone seemingly moved out of their home and left all of their possessions on the street for us to enjoy.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Oldhill Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement blocked, 9th August
item.description:
Workmen have pavement blocked and then their van is parked by blocked pavement.Walking into busy road and it’s on a curve traffic can’t get enough time to see you.You need barriers in front of these works so we can walk in road to get past

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Ledbury Road, Maida Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaning lampost, 9th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ingleton Avenue, Blackfen, London
